          "last_edited_time": 1550382389174,
          "parent_id": "c4b013a5-3f0d-4d11-aa0d-ad21cb34aae6",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "WHERE a = 12  --> INDEX(a)\nWHERE a > 12  --> INDEX(a)\n\nWHERE a = 12 AND b > 78  --> INDEX(a,b) is more useful than INDEX(b,a)\nWHERE a > 12 AND b > 78  --> INDEX(a) or INDEX(b); no way to handle both ranges\n\nORDER BY x  --> INDEX(x)\nORDER BY x, y  --> INDEX(x,y) in that order\nORDER BY x DESC, y ASC  --> No index helps - because of mixing ASC and DESC"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 5
        }
      },
